mapper.select: SELECT FesIdx, FesName, Region, Addr, StartDate, EndDate, Fee, Theme, Tel, Lat, Lon, CASE WHEN StartDate > CURDATE() THEN '예정' WHEN StartDate <= CURDATE() AND EndDate >= CURDATE() THEN '진행중' ELSE '마감' END AS status FROM festival WHERE StartDate <= CURDATE() AND EndDate >= CURDATE() ORDER BY StartDate ASC
